name: Random Buidling Generator
description:
I've been playing with this for a while, after having some inspiration while watching a youtube video  of a project to create an "infinite" maze like building akin to the backrooms game, just a little warning  that there is virtually no gameplay aside being able to edit the building and navigate inside it's randomness.

Idk if this site accepts this kind of project, but since I'm done with it for the time being, I rly didn't wanted to just delete-it all heh, so who knows, maybe I can get some useful feedback from this for any possible future endeavor.

OBS: If you choose to check it out,  for the sake of your PC please go easy on the grid size.
